paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the BRCA2 gene along with penetrance data from affected and unaffected carriers.

patients.demographics: Patients with breast, colorectal, rectum, prostate, and/or ovary cancers
patients.phenotype: Breast cancer, colorectal cancer, rectal cancer, prostate cancer, ovarian cancer

individual_records.evidence_sentence: We observed 75 different variants (results not shown) in 40 samples for a total of 567 including the reproducibility test.

functional_data.summary: The variant was confirmed by Sanger sequencing.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The variant was confirmed as pathogenic.
key_quotes: In all protocols, amplicons were lower than 50 bp.
The chemistry used in PGM was the PGM Hi-Q Ion Chef kit.

tables_processed.table_caption: False positive InDel variants included or excluded applying our validation parameters and confirmed by Sanger
